# This file contains the dates of leap seconds to be taken into account
# by the Swiss Ephemeris. 
# For each new leap second add the date of its insertion in the format
# yyyymmdd, e.g. "20081231" for 21 december 2008
19720630
19721231
19731231
19741231
19751231
19761231
19771231
19781231
19791231
19810630
19820630
19830630
19850630
19871231
19891231
19901231
19920630
19930630
19949630
19951231
19970630
19981231
20051231
20081231
20120630
20150630
20161231
